item.description:
Walk, Bike Ride or Roller Blade your way around this beautiful park on the East Bay Bike Path.

The Path is a 14.5 mile, 10 foot wide, ribbon of asphalt that provides a view of Narragansett Bay, as well as sights, sounds and smells as you travel past coves, marshes, over bridges and through the park.

We'll meet at 11:00am - (see below) - and head out by 11:10 - if your running late, please call 508-415-0590. We'll walk, ride, and roll for about two hours meeting back at one of the water view picnic spots to enjoy lunch.

About Colt State Park
This beautiful park in Bristol, RI is often referred to as the 'gem' of the State Parks System. The entire western border of the park is an open panorama onto Narragansett Bay. Open year round, the park offers four miles of bicycle trails passing along the Bay and through 464 acres of groomed fruit trees, carefully nurtured flowering bushes, and manicured lawns.

Don't forget bug spray and sun screen.

Bike Path Parking area - Independence Park - Bristol

From I-95 North and South: Take Route 195 East to Exit 7, Route 114, continue on Route 114 through the towns of Barrington, Warren and Bristol. Independence Park is located on Thames St. just after its intersection with Hope St. (Rte. 114) in Bristol.

View a map at of where the lot is at http://www.dot.ri.gov/img/content/bikeri/maps/ebbp2011_12.jpg at the bottom you'll see the number "0" next to the parking lot along with bathrooms.

We can walk, ride, and roll around for a couple hours and then meet at Colt State Park for our picnic.
Lets plan to meet at approx. 1:30-2:00 in the park at the parking area "1" by the bathrooms. To see a map of the park visit http://www.riparks.com/pdfs/ColtParkMap.pdf. On the lower left you see the "P" parking area inbetween sites 1-7 and 8-29.

If you have difficulty finding us call 508-415-0590 and I will try my best to guide you to where we are.

Picnic Lunch - so far a few have posted what they will bring below. If you have not posted what you'll be bringing, please do so. I'll bring all paper goods, water, and lemonade or ice tea. Please be considerate if you will or have posted food to bring and don't pull a no show - thank you in advance!

  • chicken salad & rolls
  • cheese & crackers
  • assorted fruit
  • veggie platter
  •
item.name: Colt State Park - Walk, Ride or Roll & Picnic
